Housing Temperature Safety Act of 2023
To require owners of covered federally assisted rental dwelling units to install temperature sensors in such units, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Housing for the elderly and disabled

bill.summary:
Housing Temperature Safety Act of 2023
This bill establishes a pilot program through which the Department of Housing and Urban Development must award grants for public housing agencies and owners of certain federally assisted rental housing to install and test temperature sensors in dwelling units (with the written permission of tenants) for purposes of ensuring that units comply with temperature-related requirements.
